comment.text:
What i read was that a gang of (6) guys did this. Osman Valenzuela, Jose-Manuel Murgas, Henry Eliezer Conzalez,  Efrain Manuel Rios Gonzales (nickname Adonis, the rapist and murderer en friend from Henry). He raped and murdered Nuris Esther Castrellón a 50 year old lady. In 2018 at a periode of 6 months 22 woman where raped and murdered there.  The Panama city police did interrogate (the hard way?) these guys and not long after these guys are murdered. Just like the 34 year old taxi driver Leonardo Arturo Gonzalez who drop of Kris and Lisanne at the beginning of the trail. The leader of the gang was the son of the tourguide ‘F’. On the cell phone from one of the gang member was a picture (total 2) with two guys and two girls swimming at a place (Caldera area) near the trail. They say it is Kris and Lisanne on the photo’s. But you have to look well to see it. I think they are on the picture. Also Lee Zeltzer found some snuff pictures showed up at Darknet: two girls on the ground surrounded by a tribe and Kris her face heavenly beaten.
